dcterms:description: A massive English news articles corpus containing around 400 million articles, used for extracting candidate terms for Wikipedia.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Corpus (LNC)

dcterms:description: A sample of 1 million distinct sentences randomly sampled from the LexisNexis Corpus, used for term extraction.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Sample (LNCS)

dcterms:description: A collection of noun phrases extracted from the LexisNexis Sample, used for identifying Wikipedia terms.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Noun Phrases (LNNP)

dcterms:creator: Behrang QasemiZadeh
Anne-Kathrin Schumann
dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating term extraction and entity recognition methods, consisting of 300 abstracts from the ACL anthology.
dcterms:title: ACL RD-TEC 2.0 benchmark

dcterms:description: An augmented set of noun phrases from the LexisNexis Noun Phrases, including additional surface forms that are co-redirects.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Noun Phrases Augmented (LN N P aug)

dcterms:description: A subset of LexisNexis Noun Phrases consisting of unigrams and bigrams, used for candidate classification.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Noun Phrases 1 (LN N P1)

dcterms:description: A subset of LexisNexis Noun Phrases consisting of bigrams and trigrams, used for candidate classification.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Noun Phrases 2 (LN N P2)

dcterms:description: A subset of LexisNexis Noun Phrases consisting of trigrams, used for candidate classification.
dcterms:title: LexisNexis Noun Phrases 3 (LN N P3)
